Text:
thanks very much
so glad to see they have brought this series back
Miranda Hart is amazingly funny and I look forward
to any and all shows she put out (next one on new years eve.....good way to start the year)
thx again for the up!

Classification: Scripted
Genre: Comedy
Status: Returning Series
Network: BBC One ( United Kingdom)
Airs: Mondays at 08:30 pm
Runtime: 30 Minutes
Premiere: November 09, 2009

Miranda is a sitcom broadcast on BBC TWO in the United Kingdom. The series is based on the radio show, Miranda Hart's Joke Shop which is based on Miranda Hart's semi-autobiographical writing. Miranda is a constant let down to her mother and she finds it hard to fit in. Miranda runs a joke shop and employs her old friend Stevie.

(http://www.tvrage.com/Miranda)
